item.title: [317] Command Help

item.description:
@p3r_0n wrote:

ok, i need to make a command like
if (command.startsWith(“kill”)) &&playerrights=3

            heightLevel = 0;
    }

or something like that (eat etc.) but i dont know how to do it. what snippet should i put? if you can give me the full code it will be greatly appreciated![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2009, 09:24:44 am[/size][hr]PLEASE HELP![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2009, 09:30:01 am[/size][hr]PLLLEEEEEAAAAAAAASSSSSSSSEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!

Read full topic
